title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official CLI and Python/JS libraries to pull, run, and chat with GGUF models locally.

title: ollama-python
summary: First-party Python client; stream chat, embed, pull, and list models with async support.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript SDK for Node & browsers (via fetch).

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration providing Ollama LLM & embeddings wrappers.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI (chat, PDF, RAG, multi-user) that proxies Ollama.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client library with fluent API and model-management helpers.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Community Ruby gem for chatting and pulling models from Ollama.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Rust-based interactive CLI with syntax highlighting and prompt history.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension bringing local LLM code completions via Ollama.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU node selection.

title: ollama-docker
summary: Official multi-arch Docker images (CPU & CUDA) with one-line run commands.

title: ollama-chat
summary: Minimal React chat app using the Ollama REST API and streaming.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Python notebook demonstrating RAG with Ollama embeddings and Chroma.

title: ollama-logseq
summary: LogSeq plugin that sends selected blocks to a local Ollama model for summarization.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration offering OllamaGenerator and OllamaTextEmbedder nodes.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: .NET client with async chat, embeddings, and model management.

title: ollama-n8n-node
summary: Community n8n node to call Ollama models inside automation workflows.

title: ollama-dbee
summary: DBeaver extension that adds SQL explain/fix assistants powered by Ollama.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Rust crate providing strongly-typed async client for Ollama APIs.

title: ollama-go
summary: Community Go SDK with context cancellation and streaming helpers.
